pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, May 20, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of London, Sadiq Khan.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual meeting with Canada’s Building Trades Unions.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation with members of the Canadian Council of Churches as part of their Annual General Meeting.

Closed to media.
